import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { Link, useParams } from "react-router-dom"; import useSinglePost from "../custom-hooks/useSinglePost"; import "../css/SinglePost.css" import MD from 'react-markdown' import usePosts from "../custom-hooks/usePosts" import {getPosts2} from "../contentful" function SinglePost() { const { id } = useParams() // const [post, isLoading] = useSinglePost(id); const [posts, isLoading] = usePosts(); const santizingPosts = posts.filter(post => post.fields.slug === id); let x console.log('bbbb',santizingPosts ) if(santizingPosts && santizingPosts[0] && santizingPosts[0].fields) { x = santizingPosts[0].fields console.log('test',x) } //const { title, body, dateTime, featureImage} = santizingPosts.map(p => p.fields) //console.log('title',title) /* return( <>
Back to All Blog Posts

{newData.fields.title}

) */ return(true) } export default SinglePost
